description: Lists all speakers in a specified domain.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If NextToken is returned, there are more results available. The value of NextToken is a unique pagination token for each page. Make the call again using the returned token to retrieve the next page. Keep all other arguments unchanged. Each pagination token expires after 24 hours.

nested_items.name: SpeakerSummaries
nested_items.description: A list containing details about each speaker in the Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: CreatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp showing the speaker's creation time.

nested_items.name: CustomerSpeakerId
nested_items.description: The client-provided identifier for the speaker.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the speaker.

nested_items.name: GeneratedSpeakerId
nested_items.description: The service-generated identifier for the speaker.

nested_items.name: LastAccessedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp when the speaker was last accessed for enrollment, re-enrollment or a successful authentication. This timestamp is accurate to one hour.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The current status of the speaker.

nested_items.name: UpdatedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp showing the speaker's last update.
